====Derived terms====
{{der-top}}
* {{l|ja|世代間}} (''sedaikan''): intergenerational
* {{l|ja|世代管理}} (''sedai kanri''): generation management
* {{l|ja|世代交代}} (''sedai kōtai''): alternation of generations
* {{l|ja|世代間倫理}} (''sedaikan rinri''): intergenerational ethics
* {{l|ja|異世代}} (''isedai''): intergenerational, of different generations
* {{l|ja|新世代}} (''shinsedai''): new-generation
* {{l|ja|次世代}} (''jisedai''): next generation
* {{l|ja|同世代}} (''dōsedai''): same generation, one's generation
* {{l|ja|異世代間}} (''isedaikan''): intergenerational
* {{l|ja|次世代携帯電話}} (''jisedai keitai denwa''): next-generation mobile phone
{{der-mid}}
* {{l|ja|新世代コンピュータ開発機構}} (''shinsedai konpyūta kaihatsu kikō''): ICOT
* {{l|ja|新世代コンピュータ技術開発機構}} (''shinsedai konpyūta gijutsu kaihatsu kikō''): The Institute for New Generation Computer Technology
* {{l|ja|現役世代}} (''gen'eki sedai''): working generation, people still working
* {{l|ja|白け世代}} (''shirakesedai''): generation of young people apathetic about social issues
* {{l|ja|団塊世代}} (''dankai sedai''): the babyboomers, the baby boom generation
* {{l|ja|第５世代コンピュータ}} (''daigo sedai konpyūta''): Fifth Generation Computer System
* {{l|ja|第５世代コンピューター}} (''daigo sedai konpyūtā''): the fifth generation computer
* {{l|ja|第４世代言語}} (''daiyon sedai gengo''): fourth generation language
* {{l|ja|相対世代番号}} (''sōtai sedai bangō''): relative generation number
* {{l|ja|団塊の世代}} (''dankai no sedai''): baby boom generation
{{der-bottom}}
